answerText: loop quantum gravity [or LQG; prompt on quantum gravity][10] Loop quantum gravity competes with this other theory for validation. It holds that all elementary particles are made up of the namesake oscillating, one-dimensional shapes.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 7 | 15 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Alan Sokal's hoax paper in Social Text purported to be aimed "Toward a Transformative Hermeneutics" of one type of this theory. For 10 points each: [10] Name this theory which seeks to prove that spacetime itself is quantized, made up of dozens of spin networks of a certain shape.
